name: Okteto
overview: Automatically create a LaunchDarkly environment for every development or preview environment.
description: Automatically create a LaunchDarkly environment every time your team creates a development or preview environment in Okteto. This integration ensures your new LaunchDarkly environment always has the most up-to-date flag targeting. Okteto will automatically manage the lifecycle of the LaunchDarkly environment for you.
author: Okteto Inc.
